name: Electron (Degiraffe)
description:
Entry for GMTK jam 2018.

A platformer game where you can't jump, or move in any way. Except for an 8 directional dash.

Bumping into glowing walls resets your dash, and dashing diagonally down when on the ground gives a shorter dash.

Press Shift or space to dash, and push the arrow keys for directions. If you prefer a controller, use the dpad or analogue stick for drection, and press A or Rb to dash.
